headerText: The `v-badge` component can wrap any type of content to highlight information to a user or to just draw attention to a specific element.

usage.desc: Any element can be used with a badge.

overlap.desc: The badge will overlap its content when using the `overlap` prop

inline.desc: Badges can also be placed inline with text.

icon.desc: The badge can use all of the currently supported icon sets.

visibility.desc: The visibility of badges can be controlled using `v-model`.
